text.div:
Abdomen CT Without then With Contrast

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt
    Code Display
    74170 Computed tomography, abdomen; without contrast material, followed by contrast material(s) and further sections
    74178 Computed tomography, abdomen and pelvis; without contrast material in one or both body regions, followed by contrast material(s) and further sections in one or both body regions

name: Abdomen CT Without then With Contrast

Computed tomography, abdomen and pelvis; without contrast material in one or both body regions, followed by contrast material(s) and further sections in one or both body regions
